content: That depends on your personal interests and the availability of classes in your area. You may want to consider trying out a traditional dance style that represents your heritage or a culture that interests you. Alternatively, you can try different dance styles to find the one that resonates with you the most. Some popular traditional dance styles to consider learning include salsa, tango, Bollywood dance, Irish step dance, hip hop, Odissi, and belly dance. Attend a few classes or workshops to see which dance style feels the most comfortable and fun to you.
